white: An elite player in the 60+ division at nationals.
The puck clinging off the post.
A speedy shot to the 5 hole.
Eating an entire Vermonster by myself.
A pass up the boards to where I should have been.
Falling over the boards onto the ice.
Getting a break away and missing the open net.
Taking the tags off equipment bought in Canada.
Riding to the tourney in a packed minivan.
20 minute stop time periods against college kids.
Shooting directly into the goalie's glove.
Making an accurate pass to the forward.
The triple deke from the Mighty Ducks movie.
Making snow angels on the ice.
Forgetting to take off skate guards.
Only letting Coatsie sharpen my skates.
Finding a Furies jersey in my hockey bag.
Learning to run the score board.
Bri wearing her purse to the bench.
Breathing heavy from chasing college kids.
Seeing the sign for Watertown on the way to Burlington VT.
A soft pass to the other team in our defensive zone.
Pretending I didn't start my hockey career as a figure skater.
Opening a beer with a hockey stick.
I don't know...Meg made me do it!.
Breaking my stick in the zamboni door.
Pissing off Big Red (aka Kate from the Furies).
Watching the ref fall down without laughing.
